<<<<<<< HEAD
Madrigalls to foure voyces newly published by Thomas Morley. The first booke Madrigals, voices (4) Morley, Thomas, 1557-1603?
[120] p. : music
By Thomas Est in Aldersgate street at the signe of the black horse, In London : M.D.XC.IV. [1594]
Four partbooks, each with separate dated title page and register. At foot of title, part 1, "Cantus."; part 2, "Altus."; part 3, "Tenor"; part 4, "Bassus.". Signatures: [A]² B-E⁴ F² ; [A]² B-E⁴ F² ; [A]² B-E⁴ F² ; [A]² B-E⁴ F² . Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======

Four partbooks, each with separate dated title page and register. At foot of title, part 1, "Cantus."; part 2, "Altus."; part 3, "Tenor"; part 4, "Bassus.".
